website_summaries.verdict: This bodywash has a following of repeat customers who like the scent, natural formula, and rich consistency, but some are concerned about the ingredients and pump that tends to break.
pros: Generates enthusiasm for its gentle formula that's ideal for babies and the whole family
cons: Pump seems cheaply made and tends to break with use or even arrive broken
Some repeat users question if all of the ingredients are organic

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Pleasant scent, even for men, and works great as a shampoo. If you let your hair dry before combing even the snarliest hair will comb out smoothly without using creme rinse, according to my husband who has very long hair that snarls like a rabid dog! Terrific product!
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Julien

customer_reviews.title: Really like this product
customer_reviews.text: The liquid soap sometimes is a little thick and needs warming in the bath to flow freely out of the bottle, but it is worth it to me to have a product that is rated with a low toxicity by the Environmental Working Group. I feel good about using this product on my daughters. However, I wish there was an alternative to the plastic packaging that is used in liquid soaps. I'm migrating to shampoo bars instead, which are often just wrapped in paper. Without the plastic bottle, I love this product. Smells great, lathers well, doesn't irritate baby's skin.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Yo

customer_reviews.title: Organic mom
customer_reviews.text: I try to be as organic and natural with things for my son as much as possible. I've been using this since he was a newborn and still to today at 2 years old. It smells amazing and leaves skin and hair soft. It lasts awhile too. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Febles

customer_reviews.title: Beware only received one.. even if it says pack of two..
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but the description says pack of two and I only received one in the mail? Very frustrating when you do not receive what you ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great Shampoo and Body wash
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product since my son was born. The sent is not over powering and my son skin is not dried out when he gets out of the tub. It is gentle to his skin he has not ever broken out because of it. Most of all it gets him clean from the top of his head to the top of his toes, even if he plays in dirt all.
customer_reviews.author: ldssmiles

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this stuff (shampoo and conditioner)
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this stuff (shampoo and conditioner)! Tried about 20 natural/organic shampoos and conditioners, many much more expensive and this is the best. All I will buy now for my daughter. Smells nice, cleans well and conditioner really works and DetanglerS my
customer_reviews.author: Chris R

customer_reviews.title: baby organics
customer_reviews.text: This is the only shampoo/body wash we use on our little one. Wish they had a lotion. Other soaps tend to break her out (j&j), this soap is gentle, leaves her skin soft, does not sting her eyes and leaves her hair shiny. I wish it had a little more scent to it, but then it might not be as gentle on baby. The only negative is you really can't leave it in the shower, any water in the bottle ruins the product. Otherwise very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product great, bottle pump clumsy.
customer_reviews.text: I am very sensitive to smells. Most just give me a headache, but I love this! Very mild. Wish they sold a refill bottle because the pump they use is really awful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Safe and smells wonderful! I love that I know that the products I’m putting on my son are safe and don’t have harmful ingredients that could damage or irritate his skin.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Koegler

customer_reviews.title: Don't Hesitate to Buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a must buy product! We used this for our daughter then switched to another brand. As soon as we switched to the other brand, she began getting a rash all over her back and shoulder. Switched back to this product and the rash was gone in several days. Really good for the skin!!! Don't hesitate to buy!
customer_reviews.author: D. Nicoletto

customer_reviews.title: Smells good!
customer_reviews.text: I must say I really love the smell of this soap, its like orange sherbert. It also works great, although I would recommend buying the conditioner also if your little on has long or thick hair. I have two daughters, both have very long hair and this shampoo doesnt help at all with tangles or conditioning, but it does work great if you just need a body wash/shampoo combo. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Boe

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo. My daughters hair always smells great and is soft and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: 3 yrs of product use
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this product on our 3 year old almost his entire life. Took us a few months to figure out regular baby soaps were drying his skin. We'll definitely use this on our soon-to-be newborn, and continue using it with our 3 year old for many many years!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Smells like Creamsicle
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have used it for both of my boys. It works great is non-irritating and it's organic. The only downside is that it smells like a Creamsicle so you may want to eat your baby's head.
customer_reviews.author: Wait, man!

customer_reviews.title: Nice Body Wash, but So-So Scent
customer_reviews.text: Like most reviewers, I was looking for a more natural body wash and shampoo for my toddler and chose this because of the good reviews. I like that it's a combo shampoo and body wash; it makes bathtime just a little faster and easier. The scent is really nice, for a little while. It smells like a creamsicle, which is nice. My son always smells nice right after his bath. However, we live in a pretty hot part of the country and my son sweats a lot. The vanilla tangerine, combined with sweaty toddler, is not a good combination. I like this soap but won't be buying it again because of the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: lovely
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this wash! It has an interesting smell, kind of like root beer, but I like it. We pair it with the nature's baby unscented lotion. My kids skin feels super soft and not greasy. Would definitely recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa de la Torre

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving snd  not returnable
customer_reviews.text: I feel deceived since title says 16oz and 2 packs but is 2 packs of 8 oz. And is not eligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: great for body wash!
customer_reviews.text: This works as body wash. I do not recommend using as shampoo. I could not effectively brush through hair afterwards compared to other shampoos even with the addition of conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It nourishes, lathers gently and smells so wonderful! Excellent products!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: My son likes it
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 12y son. He likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth your money
customer_reviews.text: I like this because it doesn't dry out my babies hair and skin. It smells nice too, and the bottle is big so it lasts quite a long time. It's definitely worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: not organic
customer_reviews.text: despite their misleading name, about 30% of the ingredients are weird chemicals; not natural. It smells good, but I am upset about the misleading labeling of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Miller

customer_reviews.title: made my daughter break out
customer_reviews.text: My sister recommended this product for me chase my daughter has eczema. As soon as I received it I used it right away and she had a horrible reaction to it. My sister loves the product, but I guess it is not for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells super good and I love that it is organic.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wash, recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, washes great. Seems gentle, and only 2 pumps are needed to lather a sponge or full head of my son's thick hair. I'd say this is a great value!
customer_reviews.author: C. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well, Smells nice, long-lasting
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way with this stuff, and with the pump spout you can control how much you use easier. The only thing I don't like about this soap is that is it a bit drying, but if you're applying a baby lotion after baths then it should be fine. It has a very pleasant, sweet, but not overwhelming scent. The back of the bottle says it is vegan and cruelty free. Overall, great product, I keep buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Severus Snape

customer_reviews.title: Only Shampoo that doesn't bother allergies
customer_reviews.text: This is the only shampoo that won't bother my wife's allergies. She loves it. I haven't tried it because we found it locally and it was on clearance so we knew is was the last of it. Now that it is available through Amazon, at a much better price I might add, I will be trying it.
customer_reviews.author: commoose

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It's recommended by a friend and using ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It's recommended by a friend and using it since baby was born. It might seem expensive, but a bottle last a long time. Love it can clean but very mild and no slippery feel after on baby skin.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love this baby soap. It does a great job without harsh chemicals, doesn't irritate the eyes or skin, and it smells like baby heaven.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Frank

customer_reviews.title: I love this wash!
customer_reviews.text: I got this wash as a shower gift and have been using it since I brought my little one home. It is so gentle on her skin yet cleans so well and what I really love is that you don't have to use much of it. It smells wonderful too. I can't say enough good about this product and I feel good about using it on my babies skin.
customer_reviews.author: lovemygirl

customer_reviews.title: Smells & Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter to mix things up and give the brand a try. It smells great and works great too.
customer_reviews.author: Troublebaker

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Nature's baby organics shampoo n body wash is a great price n smells awesome! Seems very gentle on skin . We've been using this product for a long time and will continue to ... I definitely recommend thus product
customer_reviews.author: alwaysspendingtoomuch

customer_reviews.title: awesome product
customer_reviews.text: we have been using this for our baby since birth, it is great, baby smells so good. we highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: pcacsb

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had a pump
customer_reviews.text: Smells good, works great. Just wish it had a pump dispenser instead. But other than that, no complaints from me!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Great product with great ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and so happy that I can find something without all the chemicals!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t survive the journey
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of this wash, however it showed up with both bottles slightly leaking, and one bottle’s pump top was broken.
customer_reviews.author: AO

customer_reviews.title: Great for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: Gentle enough for newborn, great for 5 year old with sensitive skin & I love it as a face wash too. Smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie La Fleur

customer_reviews.title: ... on my daughter since she was born and we love it. It smells great
customer_reviews.text: Been using this on my daughter since she was born and we love it. It smells great, is tear free, and isn't overly expensive compared to many organic baby products.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Although given it's nice fragrance, I question it's all natural claim.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best body soap ever! Very gentle and the scent is just right.
customer_reviews.author: lance

customer_reviews.title: Love this product for my boys
customer_reviews.text: Love this product for my boys. I have used it for a few years now and other than the bottle changing in size and logo/print, I have always been happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R Nowels

customer_reviews.title: Great body wash for baby
customer_reviews.text: This is gentle on my baby's skin and it smells great without containing "fragrance". I wish the lotion came in this scent.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo leaves my babies hair soft and smelling really good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent baby wash in every way!
customer_reviews.text: This baby wash, most importantly, contains all natural, organic, and simple ingredients...it also works very well, lathers great, and smells really good! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good. We use a lot of this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love this body wash. It's not 100% pure BUT it is a good alternative to the johnson's/babymagic/etc with more chemicals and colors and fragrances. Smells fresh, works nicely, rinses clean, non drying. Both of my sons love it. It does suds up a little. You don't need to pour in that much for one tub full. I buy it on sub+save and haven't considered switching in months now.
customer_reviews.author: carriagepushingmomma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells great/doesn't poison you. what more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Product great, packaging not
customer_reviews.text: This smells so good, only issue is the pumps on both bottles were broken when received.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J Lo

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying this product.
customer_reviews.text: The formula is thicker so it lasts longer. However, I miss having a pump bottle. It was easier to dispense when bathing the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Mom4

customer_reviews.title: Not tear-free...
customer_reviews.text: We like this baby wash, but our toddler complains it stings his eyes. Otherwise, good product.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H

customer_reviews.title: Nature's Baby Organics Shampoo & Body Wash, Vanilla Tangerine, 16-Ounce Bottles
customer_reviews.text: Not organic, my son developed a rush, an allergic reaction to it. Very misleading! If you look for a organic product buy something else!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Ghinea

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Made my babies hair very dry!!! Didn't feel anything extra ordinary
customer_reviews.author: Isil

customer_reviews.title: Great for my baby
customer_reviews.text: Love the soft vanilla scent. I use it every day and my baby's skin feels very soft and clean. I do recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Daly

customer_reviews.title: Smells great & cleans too
customer_reviews.text: This product smells great and cleans my children without drying their skin.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Smells Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: This smells delish. We have gotten a few that were leaky, but the product is good so we keep buying it.
customer_reviews.author: A.P.

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive name
customer_reviews.text: This product is not organic. The name is deceiving. I would send it back but its too much trouble for me.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great natural baby shampoo
customer_reviews.text: My family has used Nature's Baby Organics Shampoo and Body Wash for a few years now. It works well with my children's and my husband's sensitive skin. They use it on their hair and bodies, and they like it. The smell is mild and pleasant. It bubbles up nicely. It gets them clean. It's natural. What more can you say?
customer_reviews.author: J. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: The gel has a weird smell, like chemical.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I purchased this item. This time the gel has a weird smell, like chemical or medicine. When I purchased it before, it smelled so great, just like tangerine smell. But this time, it smells so different and weird.
customer_reviews.author: Truly Buyer

customer_reviews.title: the "hose" is too long and seems to sometimes get suctioned to the side and unable to suck up more product
customer_reviews.text: The smell is DIVINE. I will say the pump sometimes doesn't work but I think I figured out what the issue is: the "hose" is too long and seems to sometimes get suctioned to the side and unable to suck up more product. Simply snipping a small bit off the end of the hose fixed it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sew much fun

customer_reviews.title: Great! I love the scent
customer_reviews.text: Great! I love the scent. Not a super suds product but it is better that allot of other out there if you are looking for a safer gentler body wash. I will continue to purchase as long as the price stays the same or I find something better. Even though there is no better soap than home made. At least you will know exactly what is in it. Soap making is not that expensive and there are many YouTube channels that show you how to do it step by step.
customer_reviews.author: Tor Zabek

customer_reviews.title: Best body wash we've used for eczema
customer_reviews.text: My kids have super sensitive eczema prone skin. This stuff works great! Never causes rashes, always cleans nice, and it smells like a dreamsicle! I love it. It lathers up well and also works nicely for bubble baths. It doesn't take a ton to clean them. Their skin and hair are both very soft. My only issue is that it says that it's tear free but it still seems to irritate their eyes. However, it seems like every soap we've ever used, tear free or not, has bothered their eyes so this is far from a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn_19

customer_reviews.title: Still the best I tried
customer_reviews.text: still my favorite baby wash. lasts a long time, smells nice, gentle on baby/ kid's delicate skin and bottle holds up to "drop and rescue" missions of kids.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Urban Gellman

customer_reviews.title: Smells sooo good
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was drying out my baby's skin but turns out with just water, her skin was dry so I've been using a lotion. This stuff smells AMAZING and I use it on her whole body to make her smell great after a bath - and not like spilled breast milk, haha! I love it. I've thought about using it for myself it smells so good. And I feel comfortable knowing it's organic. I barely need any, a very small amount, to use on her.
customer_reviews.author: Jamieleigh Womach

customer_reviews.title: Best baby wash!
customer_reviews.text: Great wash for sensitive skin babies & adults! Has a very pleasant scent and does not leave skin oily!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous1

customer_reviews.title: I want to love it but it irritates baby's eyes...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this product because it's got such good reviews, and good non-toxic score on EWG. but somehow it seems to irritate my toddler and my baby's eyes so much. so I've only used it twice before I had to switch to another brand. I'm not sure how other parents wash their kids' hair without getting a tiny bit into the kids' eyes sometimes. it was a huge bummer since I really had great expectation about this product.
customer_reviews.author: IchenV

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell, gentle on my sons sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this shampoo and body wash! My son has very sensitive skin and can only use certain soaps, lotions and detergents! This is one he can use, and it smells soo good and leaves his skin and hair feeling clean and soft! He's been using this for the past year or so and he just turned 3!!
customer_reviews.author: HeatherL31

customer_reviews.title: EWG rating=1, performs well, but strong smell
customer_reviews.text: Bought it due to the EWG rating of 1. It lathers better than any other EWG "0" or "1" rated product I've tried, and also rinses clean, so I'd say performance is great. However the strong of the Vanilla Tangerine scent is WAY too strong; would not recommend for anyone who is even mildly scent-sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: muff

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I'm expecting in early February, so I just re-purchased a 2-pack of this great-smelling, natural shampoo & body wash. I had already used up one bottle on my 6-year old. :) This stuff smells like a "Dreamsicle", and you don't have to worry about unnecessary chemicals!!! And, it's versatile, since you can use it as a shampoo or body wash. Will definitely keep using!
customer_reviews.author: Samarah

customer_reviews.title: Good product, bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product 3 times. It was part of my subscribe and save. I've experienced 2 orders that have broken in transit. The bottle cracks or the top breaks off and it spills over everything else it was shipped with. Very messy! Customer service has been helpful each time, but I don't think I'll be reordering this item any longer. It's too messy to deal with when the bottle breaks. The product itself is nice. Keeps baby's skin soft without needing an additional moisturizer. I've been using it for 10 months.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but recommend the smaller size
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, at least for the first month or so of use. It smells great at first, is very gentle, and leaves my girls' hair soft, even when washed twice a day. I guess a downside of this product being so natural is that it does go a bit rancid after awhile and starts to smell strange. I live in a hot climate, so that probably accelerates the process, but I also use it twice a day on three girls (two with long, thick hair) and I can't finish a bottle before it starts to smell off. I will definitely buy the 8oz bottles in the future.
customer_reviews.author: kwalk

customer_reviews.title: Too strong
customer_reviews.text: The smell was not what I was expecting. Too creamsicle. I thought it would be mostly vanilla with a little orange scent, too sweet and artifical smelling for me. We are trying to use it quickly, then I might gift the second bottle away
customer_reviews.author: S. Cruze

customer_reviews.title: Different than previous formula but still good
customer_reviews.text: This product seems different than the last time I bought it. It came in a different type of bottle and seems to have a different texture to it, not as creamy, but still works the same and I feel safe using it on my daughter. The price was good and the smell is great, not over powering, just a hint of smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years on my boys now 4 & 2. Not only does it smell heavenly, but it leaves their skin very soft (not dry) and does not irritate their eyes AT ALL. I constantly am giving this product to new moms as a gift and they all seem to love it as well. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Cleans nicely, has a pleasant fragrance
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has used this shampoo / bath wash since birth. Cleans nicely, has a pleasant fragrance, and is mild enough to use everyday.
customer_reviews.author: TLP

customer_reviews.title: Great natural shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something a little safer for my little ones. Use it on both my kids as bodywash and shampoo and love it. The smell is really nice, and not too strong. I use the conditioner as well.
customer_reviews.author: JCS

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell, no allergies in this house.
customer_reviews.text: I have used only this product on my babe since he was itty bitty. He has not had any reactions to it. If any has gotten in his eyes, he has not complained. I LOVE the smell of it. It lingers for a day in his hair and it's amazing.
customer_reviews.author: LegalLexie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very gentle shampoo with good simple ingredients. We love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Murphy

customer_reviews.title: nice smell and gentle on sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This baby wash doesn't aggravate my son's mild eczema like some of the more mainstream products, and the smell is very pleasant/not sickly sweet. I should note that, contrary to what some of the reviews here say, it does not come in a pump bottle. Not a huge deal, but I was hoping for a pump so I could dispense soap with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen F. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My boys were using and now my hubby and I both switched to it.
customer_reviews.author: Asya O.

customer_reviews.title: This will make your baby smell like a creamsicle
customer_reviews.text: This will make your baby smell like a creamsicle, as if you weren't already smelling her head a million times a day! I love this stuff, and like that it comes in a two pack so I don't run out!
customer_reviews.author: Honest Mama

customer_reviews.title: I love the smell of this and I like the pump
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this and I like the pump. It suds well and doesn't sting. The smell doesn't last super long but that's ok. It works great for our kids!
customer_reviews.author: Jen S.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It smells nice and doesn't seem to cause any problems for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Waller

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo. The pump breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo. The pump breaks easily. It has happened on three bottles of ours.
customer_reviews.author: Bandirector

customer_reviews.title: Must try!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! A little goes a long way. Conveniently use for both body and hair. Can't get enough of the smell...my children smell so fresh and clean and beautiful! Not like food at all :)
customer_reviews.author: mamaof5

customer_reviews.title: Fair
customer_reviews.text: Scent is very light . No lather to speak of though. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: GiulianasMama

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this smell. My kids love it. They normally complain about something with their body wash but love this.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Use this for my own hair
customer_reviews.text: I love the orangy vanilla smell, it is not overwhelming and not irritating. I use it daily for shampoo. My son loves it as well. I do recommend using the conditioner with it,
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a safe and natural shampoo for my two kids with sensitive skin. We have subscribed and have been using this product for the past couple months and I really love it. It obviously doesn't lather as much as "regular" shampoos but its ok what matters is that it gets the job done and a safe option for my kids. The scent is just right. Not at all over bearing. I may try the lavender next time. If you subscribe you get two nice size bottles and you really can't beat the price as compared to California Baby (another great product...just more expensive). Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LAK

customer_reviews.title: great...
customer_reviews.text: Smells great! Leaves the skin nice and soft, and my kids sensitive skin has no reactions to it. It doesn't say whether or not its tear free but I haven't had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: lexylou

customer_reviews.title: Great baby soap
customer_reviews.text: Great smell, excellent amount of bubbles in the bath, and I don't have to worry about what I'm washing my son with.
customer_reviews.author: Sage's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pricey. Bought 2 sets and both shampoo pumps ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty pricey. Bought 2 sets and both shampoo pumps broke off immediately
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: This soap is not only wonderful for my children's skin, when I wash my daughter's hair she always says, "Em. . . yummy!" She really likes this soap and it keeps her very fine hair soft.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Decker

customer_reviews.title: Love this soap
customer_reviews.text: A great smelling soap. And natural. Who could ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: andee m h

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: When I first time use the shampoo on my daughter's hair, she was so excited because of smelling. She told me she love it, it smelled sweet and delicious. Yes, she said it is delicious, smelled like a cake! Anyway, she loves to use it every time when she is taking shower.
customer_reviews.author: aw13801

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Safe and effective, I use this on my whole family and myself!
customer_reviews.author: Olga Thorn

customer_reviews.title: rotten smell, product turns bad
customer_reviews.text: Before the bottle is halfway gone, the odor starts to change and smells rotten, getting a little worse each day. It's happened to more than one bottle so I'm canceling our subscription.
customer_reviews.author: eeeee930

customer_reviews.title: product goes bad before you even use it!
customer_reviews.text: these products went bad. Believe or not. and I had bought a few. I smelled something for days; them i ended checking the bottom of these products and saw it. Opened up, and smelled horrible. Don't buy it. I never got any refund, I have a few, they are big size, and long time passed.
customer_reviews.author: anapaula

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unsure if ingredient are all organic; need to do more research.
customer_reviews.author: Tetang

product_meta.title: Nature's Baby Organics Baby Shampoo And Body Wash, Moisturizing Tear Free Baby Shampoo All- Natural Baby Wash With Organic Ingredients, No Sulfate or Paraben, Vanilla Tangerine, 8 oz
feature_bullets: GENTLE BABY SHAMPOO - Bath and shower time just got more enjoyable. This luscious baby shampoo is soft and gentle enough for newborns, infants, kids, and teens. Our tear free baby shampoo is safe to use and won’t sting.

KIDS BODY WASH - This 2 in 1 Vanilla Tangerine baby shampoo and body wash is highly moisturizing and won’t dry out sensitive skin. It’s yummy refreshing scent is one that your kids will love. Best our baby shampoo is paraben and sulfate free.

MADE WITH ORGANIC INGREDIENTS - Our baby shampoo and baby wash is made with Certified Organic Aloe, Calendula and Chamomile. You can have peace of mind knowing that you’re using a safe product containing the highest quality organic ingredients.
NO HARSH CHEMICALS - Our baby wash and shampoo is a safe choice since it does not contain sulfate or parabens. Our baby shampoo is vegan and uses mostly organic ingredients.

MADE BY NATURE’S BABY ORGANICS - This baby shampoo is made by Baby Organics. We are committed to being part of the Organic Trade Association and producing only the highest quality baby products without harsh chemicals.
